item.title: Added 2 services
item.description:
https://rocketgit.com - Repository Hosting based on Git. Unlimited Public & Private repositories.
https://similarweb.com - — Analytics for Web & Mobile Apps. Free Plan offers 5 results per metric, 1 month of mobile app data & 3 months of website data.

item.title: Added PowerBI & Codegiant
item.description:
https://codegiant.io - Project Management with Repository hosting & CI/CD. Free Plan Offers Unlimited Repositories,Projects & Documents with 5 Team Members. 500 CI/CD minutes per month. 30000 Serverless Code Run minutes per month.1GB repository storage.
https://powerbi.com - — Business Insights & Analytics by Microsoft. Free Plan offers limited use with 1 Million User licenses.

item.title: Added free IP geolocation API
item.description: https://www.abstractapi.com/ip-geolocation-api - API](https://www.abstractapi.com/ip-geolocation-api) — IP Geolocation API from Abstract - Extensive free plan allowing 200,000 requests per month.

item.title: Added Analytics Services.
item.description:
https://analytics.google.com/ - — Google Analytics
https://hotjar.com) — Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. 100 snapshots/day (max capacity: 300 - Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. 100 snapshots/day (max capacity: 300). 3 snapshot heatmaps which can be stored for 365 days. Unlimited Team Members.
https://statcounter.com/ - Website Viewer Analytics. Free plan for analytics of 500 most recent visitors.

item.title: add Nami ML
item.description: https://www.namiml.com/ - Complete platform for in-app purchases and subscriptions on iOS and Android, including no-code paywalls, CRM, and analytics. Free for all base features to run an IAP business.

item.title: Add Mergify
item.description: https://mergify.io - workflow automation and merge queue for GitHub — Free for public GitHub repositories

item.title: Add StackBy
item.description: https://stackby.com/ - One tool that brings together flexibility of spreadsheets, power of databases and built-in integrations with your favorite business apps. Free plan includes unlimited users, 10 stacks, 2GB attachment per stack.

item.title: Add Bird Eats Bug
item.description: https://www.birdeatsbug.com/) — Report bugs faster (and better - Bug](https://www.birdeatsbug.com/) — Report bugs faster (and better). Record your screen with Bird browser extension, it will auto-capture technical data that engineers need to debug. Free tier suitable for small teams.

item.title: Added 3 new services
item.description:
https://zube.io - Project management with free plan for 4 Projects & 4 users. GitHub integration available.
https://codeblocks.org - Free Fortran & C/C++ IDE. Open Source and runs on Windows,macOS & Linux.
https://elementor.com - WordPress website builder. Free plan available with 40+ Basic Widgets.
